def.name: Hepatitis B birth dose was not administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Hepatitis B birth dose was not administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hepatitis B-containing vaccines" and "Birth dose" = TRUE) = 0

a:s.a:s: "Number of Hepatitis B Dose 0 Doses Administered"

operand.name: Number of Hepatitis B Dose 0 Doses Administered

def.name: Hepatitis B birth dose was administered

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Hepatitis B birth dose was administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Vaccine type" = "Hepatitis B-containing vaccines" and "Birth dose" = TRUE) = 1

a:s.a:s: "Number of Hepatitis B Dose 0 Doses Administered"

operand.name: Number of Hepatitis B Dose 0 Doses Administered

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" < Member States defined upper limit

a:t.value: Client's age is more than {Member States defined upper limit}

a:t.value: "Date of birth" > Member States defined upper limit

HepBBirthDoseAgeLimitDays

def.name: Client's age is less than {Member States defined lower limit}

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is less than {Member States defined lower limit}

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" < Member States defined lower limit

operand.name: Current Patient Age In Weeks
HepBLowerLimitWeeks

def.name: Client's age is more than or equal to {Member States defined lower limit}

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is more than or equal to {Member States defined lower limit}

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" ≥ Member States defined lower limit

operand.name: Current Patient Age In Weeks
HepBLowerLimitWeeks

def.name: Client's age is more than {Member States defined lower limit}

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's age is more than {Member States defined lower limit}

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Date of birth" > Member States defined lower limit

a:t.name: note
a:t.value: This seems like it should be based on missing the birth dose and not the same as other categories that are after the birth dose.

operand.name: Current Patient Age In Days
HepBBirthDoseAgeLimitDays

def.name: Client's weight at birth was over 2000 g

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's weight at birth was over 2000 g

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Birth weight in grams" ≥ 2000

a:s.a:s: "Client's weight at birth was over 2000 g"

expression.name: Client's weight at birth was over 2000 g

def.name: Client's weight at birth was below 2000 g

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client's weight at birth was below 2000 g

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Birth weight in grams" < 2000

a:s.a:s: "Client's weight at birth was below 2000 g"

expression.name: Client's weight at birth was below 2000 g

def.name: Client was not a premature infant at birth

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client was not a premature infant at birth

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Preterm birth" ≠ TRUE

a:s.a:s: "Client was not a premature infant at birth"

expression.name: Client was not a premature infant at birth

def.name: Client was a premature infant at birth

a:t.name: input
a:t.value: Client was a premature infant at birth

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Preterm birth" = TRUE

a:s.a:s: "Client was a premature infant at birth"

expression.name: Client was a premature infant at birth
